title: AI applications in cyber security
author: carl pinto
excerpt: Machine learning is becoming the first line of defense in cybersecurity, powering anomaly detection, predictive threat intelligence, and adaptive defenses that evolve against increasingly sophisticated digital attacks.

title: Reinforcement Learning in LLMs
author: aswil colaco
excerpt: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback aligns language models with human preferences, improving accuracy, reducing harmful outputs, and enhancing conversational quality across real-world natural language processing applications.

title: FlutterFlow Workshop
author: aadithya rao0
excerpt: Our FlutterFlow workshop explored drag-and-drop design, API integration, and rapid prototyping, offering developers practical tips and insights to build cross-platform apps quickly without heavy coding.

title: Edge AI and the Future of IoT
author: jon doe
excerpt: Edge AI powers smarter IoT by enabling real-time decisions on devices, reducing latency, improving privacy, and transforming industries like healthcare, manufacturing, and transportation with faster, localized intelligence.
